title: communications between Erin Schilling Kingsbury and Berkeley Police

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: communications between Erin Schilling Kingsbury and Berkeley Police
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

ALL communications between jwilson@cityofberkeley.info and erin.kingsbury@acgov.org

ALL communications between kfutch@cityofberkeley.info and erin.kingsbury@acgov.org

ALL communications between JLouis@cityofberkeley.info and erin.kingsbury@acgov.org

ALL communications between flandrum@cityofberkeley.info and erin.kingsbury@acgov.org

ALL communications between jwilson@berkeleyca.gov and erin.kingsbury@acgov.org

ALL communications between kfutch@berkeleyca.gov and erin.kingsbury@acgov.org

ALL communications between JLouis@berkeleyca.gov and erin.kingsbury@acgov.org

ALL communications between flandrum@berkeleyca.gov and erin.kingsbury@acgov.org

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Requester
